00020 #ifndef NETWORK_SOCKETADDRESS_H
00021 #define NETWORK_SOCKETADDRESS_H
00022 
00023 #include <sys/socket.h>
00024 
00025 #include <rdkcore/network/netexception.h>
00026 
00027 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00028  *   INTERNET STRUCTURES MEMO
00029  *   struct sockaddr {
00030  *       unsigned short    sa_family;    // address family, AF_xxx
00031  *       char              sa_data[14];  // 14 bytes of protocol address
00032  *   }; 
00033  *
00034  *   struct sockaddr_in {
00035  *       short int          sin_family;  // Address family
00036  *       unsigned short int sin_port;    // Port number
00037  *       struct in_addr     sin_addr;    // Internet address
00038  *       unsigned char      sin_zero[8]; // Same size as struct sockaddr
00039  *   }; 
00040  *
00041  *  // Internet address (a structure for historical reasons)
00042  *   struct in_addr {
00043  *       unsigned long s_addr; // that's a 32-bit long, or 4 bytes
00044  *   }; 
00045  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00046 
00047 namespace Network {
00048 
00049 class SocketAddress {
00050     // Constructors
00051     public:
00053         SocketAddress() throw();
00054         
00056         inline SocketAddress( const struct sockaddr& address ) throw() : address(address) {};
00057 
00058     // Getters interface
00059     public:
00061         inline short getFamily() const throw() { return address.sa_family; }
00062         
00064         inline const struct sockaddr& getAddress() const throw() { return address; }
00065         
00067         inline struct sockaddr& getAddress() throw() { return address; }
00068 
00069     // Setters interface
00070     public:
00071         inline short setFamily() const throw() { return address.sa_family; }
00072         
00073     protected:
00074         struct sockaddr address;
00075 };
00076 
00077 }
00078 
00079 #endif
